data.name: Fractured Space
data.detailed_description:
With 5v5 matches, individual skill in combat alone cannot secure victory. Your team must decide where to focus its efforts; when to advance and retreat. Every match is a war to be won through multiple battles. Unity is strength.


Pick a manufacturer, choose a class and customize your weapon loadouts. Earn credits to purchase new ships and start expanding your fleet. Tailor your craft to your combat preferences, and be the envy of the fleet when your interstellar juggernaut warps into battle.


With multiple loadouts and a plethora of ships on the way, no two teams will go into battle with the same setup, giving you a unique set of choices and options in a given match. Know your ship, learn your environment and adapt your tactics accordingly.


Join us as we throw open our doors on development of a very new space combat experience. The discussion on strategy is endless; share your war stories, learn from others and become a part of the Fractured Space universe.

Fractured Space is team-based space combat fought in gigantic capital ships.



"...the final product may well be one of the best space combat games ever made" - PCGamesN

Each multiplayer match offers intense team battles combining deadly individual fights with larger team strategy. Use your ship's unique abilities and weapons to exploit enemy weakness and control the map by working with your team to obliterate opponents.
With the intensity of a shooter and the big-picture-thinking of a strategy game, Fractured Space is at the forefront of an exciting new frontier for the genre.


Space Combat Has Reached A Singularity.



As an Early Access title, Fractured Space is still very much under development. The game will evolve over time, and – as a founder – you’ll see improvements and additions to the game as they happen.

We’re keen to bring you along every step of the way - we've shifted our mentality as a studio in order to reflect this, adopting an Open Development ethic. We're throwing open the doors to the studio, with regular updates from the team, sharing assets at varying degrees of completion, and even keeping you in the loop with our sprint plans.

For the latest ship concepts, dev logs and other news check out our official website.
We are also regularly updating our Roadmap on Trello (also, vote there for your most wanted features): https://trello.com/b/pOsdj00F/fractured-space

If you want to talk through ideas for next steps, ask questions regarding design choices or simply hang out with the team and other members of the Fractured Space community join us every Thursdays evening between 19:00 and 21:00 GMT. Just tune in on our Twitch channel.

Fractured Space servers are located on both East and West coast of US, as well as in London. You should be fine on any of these, however, with 250+ ping still playing without issue.

Early Access - Tier system


We have different level at which you can enter our Early Access. To understand what each option offers, we made a recap below:







Early Access progress


Here is a quick overview of the progress of the game through Early Access:

November 2014
  • Launched on Early Access

December 2014
  • Map rework (gas station, levelling up system, Jump routes)
  • Added Loadouts for some ships for players to test
  • Balance and bug fixes

January 2015
  • Frame rate optimisation (on-going effort)
  • Added 2 new ships (Enforcer and Corvette)
  • Added 4 ship skins (Assassin, Flagship, Sniper, Disruptor)
  • Balance and bug fixes

February 2015
  • New UI
  • Added 2 new ships (Brawler and Equalizer)
  • Added Crew gameplay
  • Balance and bug fixes

April 2015
  • New system for the small crafts and Point Defense
  • Added 2 new ships (Reaper and Destroyer)
  • New skins
  • Balance and bug fixes

May 2015
  • New type of ship added: Carriers
  • Added 2 new ships (Carrier and Infiltrator)
  • Added 11 new Crew (including Captain Mighty Jingles)
  • Balance and bug fixes

June 2015
  • Added 2 new ships (Leviathan and Ranger)
  • Added Free Weekend rewards (3 skins and the Revenant ship)
  • Extended players ranks from to 10 to 50
  • Balance and bug fixes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1 (must have KB 2670838 installed) / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11, SM5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX, AMD HD6850 or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11, SM5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX, AMD HD6850 or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.

movies.name: Fractured Space Early Access Trailer - July 2015
The Evolution of Fractured Space - May 2015
